title: Sound On: Rep. Slotkin, Rep. French Hill
itunes:title: Sound On: Rep. Slotkin, Rep. French Hill
description:
Guests: Justin Sink, Bloomberg White House reporter, Calvin Schnure, Senior Economist at Nareit, Brendan Buck, Partner at Seven Letter and former spokesman and advisor to House Speaker Paul Ryan, Jim Kessler, Co-Founder of Third Way and former legislative policy director Sen. Chuck Schumer, Rep. Elissa Slotkin, a Democrat representing Michigan's 8th congressional district, and Rep. French Hill, a Republican representing Arkansas's 2nd congressional district.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
